1.1.1.1.6.1.1. shapepipe.modules.tileobj_as_exp_package.tileobj_as_exp_script module¶

TILEOBJ_AS_EXP_SCRIPT

This script contains a class to handle processing for the tileobj_as_exp_script module: Writing objects selected on tiles to catalogue files in expoure-single-CCD format.

Author

Martin Kilbinger <martin.kilbinger@cea.fr>

Date

February 2019

Version

1.0

exception shapepipe.modules.tileobj_as_exp_package.tileobj_as_exp_script.TileObjAsExpError[source]¶

Bases: Exception

TileObjAs_ExpError

Generic error that is raised by this script.

class shapepipe.modules.tileobj_as_exp_package.tileobj_as_exp_script.tileobj_as_exp(input_file_names, output_dir, image_number, config, w_log)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for writing selected objects on tiles to catalogues in

exposure-single-CCD format

Parameters

  • input_file_name (list of 2 string) – path to input files, [image, catalogue]

  • config (config class) – config file content

  • output_dir (string) – output directory

  • image_number (string) – image number for input tile according to numbering scheme from config file

  • w_log (log file class) – log file

Returns

Return type

None

process()[source]¶
write_tileobj_to_exp_CCDs(dat_tile, exp_CCD_list, wcs_list, nx_list, ny_list)[source]¶

Write objects from tile to exposure-single-CCD catalogues

Parameters

  • dat_tile (astropy.table.Table) – tile catalogue data

  • exp_CCD_list (list of strings) – exposure-single-CCD file name base list

  • wcs_list (dictionary of wcs.WCS) – WCS information

  • nx_list (dictionary of int) – number of pixels in x

  • ny_list (dictionary of int) – number of pixels in y

Returns

n_tileobj – number of tile-object catalogues written

Return type

int

Return list of exposure file used for the tile in process, from tiles FITS header

MKDEBUG: Note: this function is identical to the find_exposures class routine
